hero.description: Algorithmic trading, boosted by Machine Learning—integrated with your crypto exchange.

backtestModel.label: Backtest

indicators.label: Indicators

financialData.label: Financial Data
financialData.title: Financial Data
financialData.description: We use financial data to train models and identify weak spots in algorithms.

sphere.title: Bring ML to your trading
sphere.description: Our Machine Learning models are trained on thousands of trades to boost algorithm performance.

step1.title: Log in or create an account to get started
step1.description: Create a secure account to unlock every tool. We protect your information with industry-standard encryption and strict access controls, so your data stays private while you work.
step1.containerTitle: Log in or create an account

step2.title: Pick algorithm and cryptocurrency to trade
step2.description: Pick an algorithm, then a cryptocurrency, and backtest the pair. You can explore different combinations and compare results.

step3.title: Connect to your crypto exchange
step3.description: Connect your exchange to enable automated execution. We support several popular exchanges and are adding more. You can also run signals without connecting an exchange.

step4.title: Enable automated trading
step4.description: Set your parameters and choose whether to execute trades automatically or receive notifications. The system runs continuously and follows your configuration.
step4.containerTitle: You all set! Now bot will trade for you

footer.title: Get 1 month
footer.description: Get access to our trading algorithms, backtest and machine learning models for 1 month for free. No credit card required.
footer.tagline: Trading platform for automated crypto trading

review1.quote: I have a lot more free time.
review1.description: Monkeys Finance reduced the time I spend watching charts. I can focus on other things while it monitors signals based on my settings.
review1.name: Pawel Kowalski

review2.quote: I'm so glad I found Monkeys Finance. Signals are clear, and the automation is easy to configure.
review2.name: Omar El-Sayed

review3.description: From generating signals to tracking strategy performance over time and optionally automating execution, everything is in one place.
review3.name: Alexey Kuznetsov

review4.quote: The ML filter is a helpful extra layer.
review4.description: Adding a machine-learning step to screen signals has been useful, especially for reducing noise.
review4.name: Steve Smith

about.title: About Monkeys Finance
about.subtitle: Building automated crypto
about.intro: We built Monkeys Finance for crypto traders who want automation without watching charts around the clock. Our cloud-based system runs 24/7, continuously analyzing cryptocurrency markets to identify trading opportunities.
about.howItWorksDescription: Based on your selected algorithm, our system runs continuously in the cloud, monitoring for trading signals. When a signal is detected, it's passed to machine learning models trained on years of historical market data for verification. If the signal passes our rigorous validation checks, the system automatically executes trades on your exchange or sends you a notification through your preferred channel.
about.differenceDescription: Monkeys Finance goes beyond basic algorithmic trading by incorporating machine learning models trained on years of market behavior. Every signal generated by our algorithms is validated through our ML models to ensure quality and reliability. We run comprehensive monthly backtests to verify strategy performance and provide you with detailed reports. Additionally, we continuously retrain our models on the latest market data to adapt to evolving market conditions.
about.whatsNextDescription: We're actively expanding support for additional exchanges, notification providers, strategies, and features. We value your input—if you have ideas or feedback, reach out to us on GitHub or Telegram. Help us build the best trading platform together.

backtestTable.description: Machine learning can improve algorithm performance. We train our model on thousands of trades to inform decisions.
backtestTable.chartDescription: Hypothetical/simulated performance for informational purposes only. Assumptions apply; leverage increases risk. Not investment advice.

staticDitherBackground.description: Side-by-side results for Bitcoin, the strategy without leverage, and the strategy with 5× leverage.
staticDitherBackground.stat1: return on investment in Bitcoin (spot market)
staticDitherBackground.stat2: return on investment with our algorithm and 5x leverage
staticDitherBackground.stat3: return on investment with our algorithm and no leverage
staticDitherBackground.disclaimer: * based on a backtest performed on the period of jan 1 2025 - dec 1 2025 on Binance.us. Hypothetical/simulated performance for informational purposes only. Assumptions apply; leverage increases risk. Not investment advice.

chartCompareToBitcoin.titleSecondLine: in Bitcoin at the beginning of 2025?
chartCompareToBitcoin.description: In a down 2025 market (Bitcoin -12%), our ML strategy delivered stronger simulated results versus buy-and-hold.
chartCompareToBitcoin.chartDescription: Hypothetical/simulated performance for informational purposes only. Assumptions apply; leverage increases risk. Not investment advice.

philosophy.quote: In the short run, the market is a voting machine; in the long run, it is a weighing machine.
philosophy.author: Benjamin Graham
philosophy.description: This famous quote reflects the philosophy behind this platform. Graham's legacy is foundational for many investors, and we're no exception. This platform is built to navigate short-term market noise and to pursue a statistical edge over the long run.

history.emptyDescription: After bot completes a trade, it will appear here.

header.title: Your
header.description: We use industry standards to protect you and your data. Our main priority is to ensure a safe trading experience.

cloud.title: Cloud
cloud.description: Your data is processed on AWS infrastructure. Nothing is stored or processed in your browser, eliminating client-side vulnerabilities

auth.title: Auth
auth.description: Multi-factor authentication powered by Clerk. Your credentials are managed by security experts, not stored in our database.

database.title: Database
database.description: Your account data is protected by the same database infrastructure used by Fortune 500 companies. Automatic backups ensure you'll never lose data

encryption.title: Encryption
encryption.description: We encrypt your API keys with military-grade encryption before storing them—adding an extra security layer on top of database encryption.

credentialCard.securityNoteLine1: For security, your API credentials are encrypted and hidden.
credentialCard.securityNoteLine2: You can only update or delete them.
credentialCard.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete these credentials?

tosPage.title: Terms of
tosPage.address: Address: 1888 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC, Canada

section1.title: 1) Agreement to these Terms
section1.content: By accessing or using Monkeys Finance (the "Service"), you agree to these Terms of Service ("Terms"). If you do not agree, do not use the Service.

section2.title: 2) Eligibility
section2.intro: You may use the Service only if you:
section2.item1: are at least the age of majority where you live (19 in British Columbia), and
section2.item2: are legally permitted to use your connected exchange and to trade derivatives/futures (if applicable), and

section3.title: 3) The Service
section3.intro: Monkeys Finance provides tools such as:
section3.item3: notifications to third-party notification providers, and
section3.item4: optional automated order placement on supported exchanges (including futures), based on your configuration.
section3.outro: The list of supported exchanges and integrations may change over time.

section4.title: 4) No investment advice
section4.content: The Service is provided for informational and automation purposes only and does not provide investment, legal, accounting, or tax advice. You are solely responsible for your trading decisions, configurations, and outcomes.

section5.title: 5) Trading risks and important warnings
section5.content1: Trading digital assets—especially futures and leveraged trading—involves substantial risk and may result in significant losses, including the loss of your entire position and/or additional losses depending on your exchange and leverage settings.
section5.content2: Backtests are simulated. Simulated results do not reflect actual trading and have limitations (including assumptions about fees, slippage, liquidity, execution, and market impact). Past or simulated performance is not indicative of future results.

section6.title: 6) Accounts and security
section6.content: You must provide accurate information and keep your account secure. You are responsible for all activity under your account.
section6.item1: keeping your exchange API keys valid and up to date,
section6.item2: granting only the permissions you intend to grant,
section6.item3: reviewing your exchange settings (including leverage) and order parameters, and

section7.title: 7) Exchange API keys and permissions
section7.content: If you connect an exchange, you authorize the Service to place orders based on your settings.
section7.item1: exchange APIs can fail, be delayed, or behave unexpectedly;
section7.item2: orders may be rejected, partially filled, filled at unexpected prices, or executed when markets move rapidly; and
section7.item3: the Service may experience errors or outages.
section7.outro: We may surface certain errors in your history/logs, but not all errors can be detected or displayed. You agree to actively monitor your account and risk exposure.

section8.title: 8) Notifications
section8.content: Notifications depend on third-party providers and may be delayed, throttled, or not delivered. Do not rely on notifications as your only risk control.

section9.title: 9) Free trial, billing, auto-renewal, and cancellation
section9.paidPlansValue: After the trial, paid subscriptions renew automatically unless cancelled.
section9.autoRenewalValue: By subscribing, you authorize recurring charges via Stripe using your selected payment method.
section9.cancelAnytimeValue: You can cancel at any time from your account settings. Cancellation takes effect at the end of the current billing period unless stated otherwise at checkout.
section9.priceChangesValue: We may change pricing with advance notice (e.g., via email and/or in-app notice). Changes apply on your next renewal unless otherwise required by law.

section10.title: 10) Acceptable use and restrictions
section10.item1: abuse the free trial (including repeated account creation to obtain multiple trials),
section10.item2: attempt to bypass access controls or security measures,
section10.item3: reverse engineer, scrape, or copy the Service or any portion of it,
section10.item4: use the Service for illegal activity or to violate any exchange rules, laws, or regulations,
section10.item5: interfere with or disrupt the Service.
section10.outro: If we detect free-trial abuse (including repeated use of the same email to recreate accounts for additional trials), we may suspend or ban accounts.

section11.title: 11) Intellectual property
section11.content: The Service (including software, designs, text, logos, algorithms, and model outputs) is owned by Monkeys Finance Inc. and its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. You receive a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to use the Service for your personal or internal business use, subject to these Terms.

section12.title: 12) Suspension and termination
section12.content: We may suspend or terminate access to the Service at any time if we believe you violated these Terms, created risk to others, or for legal/compliance reasons. You may stop using the Service at any time.

section13.title: 13) Disclaimer of warranties
section13.content: The Service is provided "as is" and "as available." We do not guarantee uninterrupted operation, error-free performance, or that signals, backtests, or automated execution will meet your expectations.

section14.title: 14) Limitation of liability
section14.intro: To the maximum extent permitted by law:
section14.item1: Monkeys Finance Inc. will not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, or any loss of profits, trading losses, lost data, or business interruption.
section14.item2: Our total liability for any claim related to the Service is limited to the amount you paid us in the 12 months before the event giving rise to the claim. If you have not paid us, the limit is $0.

section15.title: 15) Indemnification
section15.content: You agree to indemnify and hold Monkeys Finance Inc. harmless from claims arising out of your use of the Service, your exchange activity, your configurations, or your violation of these Terms or applicable laws.

section16.title: 16) Changes to these Terms
section16.content: We may update these Terms from time to time. If changes are material, we'll provide notice (e.g., email or in-app). Continued use after changes means you accept the updated Terms.

section17.title: 17) Governing law
section17.content: These Terms are governed by the laws of British Columbia and the applicable federal laws of Canada, without regard to conflict of law rules. Any disputes will be brought in the courts located in Vancouver, BC, unless required otherwise by law.

tosPage.footerNote: By using Monkeys Finance, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to these Terms of Service.

privacyPage.title: Privacy
privacyPage.address: Address: 1888 Victoria Dr, Vancouver, BC, Canada

section1.title: 1) Overview
section1.content: This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and share personal information when you use Monkeys Finance.

section2.title: 2) Information we collect
section2.usageDataValue: log data, IP address, device/browser information, pages/actions, timestamps.
section2.tradingDataValue: selected strategies, parameters, settings, backtest selections.
section2.notificationsDataValue: your chosen notification channel identifiers (e.g., webhook URL, chat ID) if you connect them.
section2.paymentInfoValue: subscription status and billing metadata (payments handled by Stripe; we do not store full card numbers).

section3.title: 3) How we use information
section3.item1: provide and operate the Service (signals, backtests, notifications, execution),
section3.item2: secure accounts, prevent fraud and free-trial abuse,
section3.item3: support customers and respond to requests,

section4.title: 4) How we share information
section4.intro: We may share information with service providers that help us operate the Service, such as:
section4.outro: We may also share information if required by law, to enforce our Terms, or to protect rights and safety.

section5.title: 5) Security
section5.content: We use technical and organizational safeguards intended to protect information. Exchange API keys are stored encrypted and are not displayed in plaintext in the application.

section6.title: 6) Retention
section6.content: We retain personal information as long as necessary to provide the Service, comply with legal requirements, resolve disputes, and enforce agreements. You may request deletion subject to legal and operational limitations.

section7.title: 7) Access and correction
section7.content: You may request access to or correction of your personal information by contacting us at

section8.title: 8) Cookies and analytics
section8.content: We may use cookies or similar technologies for authentication, security, and performance.

section9.title: 9) International transfers
section9.content: Service providers may process data outside Canada. When this happens, information may be subject to the laws of those jurisdictions.

section1.title: 1) Not investment advice
section1.content: Monkeys Finance does not provide investment advice. Content, signals, models, and backtests are for informational purposes only.

section2.title: 2) Trading and leverage risk
section2.content: Crypto trading involves substantial risk. Futures and leverage can magnify both gains and losses and may result in rapid liquidation.

section3.title: 3) Backtests are simulated
section3.content: Backtests and performance charts are simulated/hypothetical and do not represent actual trading. Simulations depend on assumptions (fees, slippage, spreads, liquidity, execution timing, and market impact). Results may differ materially in live markets.

section4.title: 4) Automation and execution risk
section4.content: Automation can fail due to configuration errors, exchange outages, API limits, latency, partial fills, or unexpected market behavior. You are responsible for monitoring your account and exposure.

section5.title: 5) No guarantees
section5.content: We do not guarantee profits, performance, or that strategies will outperform any benchmark. Past or simulated performance does not predict future results.

section6.title: 6) Third-party services
section6.content: Connected exchanges and notification providers are third-party services with their own terms. We are not responsible for their availability, security, or performance.
